name: MrBall (wonoz)
description:
This little game is part of a SUMI test of my school work.

Hope you guys can help me by answer the survey after you played the game through this link: -https://forms.gle/jkrmLtYtACrm68Mu6

Anyone who interest on the project, you can download the unity package of the game through this link:- https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZRQeumlNaTqMIqBPY4cbs_4UUHSCK2U6/view?usp=shari...

The grappling mechanics is based on a video made by 1 Minute Unity 

you guys can check it out below here.
